subject: Roads and Traffic
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The president of Kentucky’s Senate called for legislative hearings after a lengthy traffic jam Saturday left some irate fans stuck in their cars unable to get to the state’s first Nascar race on time.
snippet: The president of Kentucky’s Senate called for legislative hearings after a lengthy traffic jam Saturday left some irate fans stuck in their cars unable to get to the state’s first Nascar race on time.
